#summary Extensions for ReflectionHelper

= Introduction =

Simple extensions which adds `Reflect()` to any object.

= Samples =

{{{
public void ChangeTransferAmountToTenDollars(Transfer transfer)
{
	return transfer.Reflect()
		.Field("amount")
		.SetValue(10)
		.Property("Currency")
		.SetValue("USD")
		.Return<Transfer>();
}
}}}
